URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE MIDLAND/ODESSA TX
355 AM CST SUN DEC 14 2014

...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT TODAY FOR THE GUADALUPE MOUNTAINS...

...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE VAN HORN/HWY 54
CORRIDOR AND MOST OF SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO...

.A STRONG UPPER LEVEL TROUGH WILL SWING ACROSS THE AREA TODAY. AS IT
DOES FAST WINDS ROUNDING THE BASE OF THE TROUGH WILL SWEEP OVER
THE REGION PRODUCING HIGH WINDS ACROSS THE GUADALUPE MOUNTAINS.
STRONG WIND WILL ALSO SPILL ONTO THE ADJACENT PLAINS THIS AFTERNOON.
WIND SPEEDS WILL DECREASE DURING THE EVENING AS THE THE TROUGH
MOVES OFF TO THE EAST.

...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM

* EVENT...HIGH WINDS.

* TIMING...TODAY INTO EARLY EVENING.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A HIGH WIND WARNING MEANS A HAZARDOUS HIGH WIND EVENT IS EXPECTED
OR OCCURRING.  SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS
OF 58 MPH OR MORE CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.
